attributes.action: re in state capital punishment for terrorists.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After a weekend that could have been carnage 29/06/07,we have would be terrorists arrested and cctv footage to prove beyond reasonable doubt that they are plotting against us,if they are british born that is treason (a hanging offence under british law) if they are not they need interagating  and once all information is gained they should be executed and not imprisoned and the taxpayer should not foot the bill.to feed and keep these people alive they should be killed  soon after judgement so as to not waste money on last meals and rights
